answers.answer: I'm swollen all over.  My feet, ankles and calfs are the worst but my hands and arms are swollen as well.  My doctor said it's a normal part of pregnancy and it will go away after I deliver but it sure is uncomfortable.  It goes down if I stay off my feet all day and keep them elevated above my heart and drink lots of water but it doesn't completely go away and it's become painful.
I was extremely swollen towards the end with my first because of preeclampsia (spelling?), just check with your doctor!
Doctor said natural and it will go away after 2 weeks after delivery. Everything else is fine. But thank you for concern.
Just ready and it's the strangest feeling if I shake foot I can feel the water move.

question: Anyone else able to feel all the water build up in feet?
title: Swelling
